MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the DG10 postcode area of Moffat.It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1:30pm due to repairs required to broken overhead line equipment and this may be affecting the supply to your property. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of repair work required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:56pm on 3rd February 2021.
